core:action.core:name: CustomerName
core:action.core:comment: Creates an entity from the namespace and local name.

core:param.value: No List Data Configured for RECEIPT_CONFIG
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: concat(concat(concat(concat("Transaction Id : " , transactionId) , concat(" , PrintDocumentUrl : " , printDocumentUrl)), concat(", ReprintReceipt : ", reprintReceipt ? true : false )), concat(", ReceiptCopyNumber :", receiptCopyNumber))
